## Resources.ResourceManager.conditionSets property

A [ConditionSetCollector](./ts-res.conditions.conditionsetcollector.md) which contains the [condition sets](./ts-res.conditions.conditionset.md) used so far by the [resource candidates](./ts-res.resources.resourcecandidate.md) in this manager.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get conditionSets(): ReadOnlyConditionSetCollector;
```
